game.name: minetest_game
game.short_description: The classic "Minetest". A lightweight and well-maintained base for modding
game.title: Minetest Game

long_description:
### Description:

Mod that makes [default glass nodes][default] colorable with *unifieddyes:airbrush*.

This will also become standalone, independent of *default* in the future.

### Licensing:

- [MIT](https://github.com/AntumMT/mod-glass/blob/master/LICENSE.txt)

### Requirements:

Depends:

- [![default](https://img.shields.io/static/v1?label=GitHub&message=default&color=%23375a7f
)][default]
- [![unifieddyes](https://img.shields.io/static/v1?label=ContentDB&message=unifieddyes&color=%23375a7f
)](https://content.luanti.org/packages/VanessaE/unifieddyes/)

### Links:

- [Changelog](https://github.com/AntumMT/mod-glass/blob/master/changelog.txt)
- [TODO](https://github.com/AntumMT/mod-glass/blob/master/TODO.txt)


[Minetest]: http://www.minetest.net/
[default]: https://github.com/minetest/minetest_game/blob/master/mods/default
name: glass
short_description: Enhances default glass to make it colorable.
title: Glass
